channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Alabama Gov. Kay Ivey treated for dehydration at campaign rally
item.description: Alabama Gov. Kay Ivey was treated by paramedics Sunday after appearing to become unsteady at a campaign rally for congressional candidate Caroleene Dobson.

item.title: Florida will vote on marijuana, abortion in an election that will test GOP’s dominance
item.description: Florida’s election will test whether the state maintains its new reputation as a Republican stronghold, as Democrats count on turnout for abortion rights and recreational marijuana ballot questions.

item.title: Boeing machinists are holding a contract vote that could end their 7-week strike
item.description: Unionized factory workers at Boeing are voting on Monday whether to accept a contract offer or to continue their strike.
